website_summaries.verdict: A lovely and illuminating addition to any indoor or outdoor space.
pros: Wide variety of color and brightness settings on the remote
Adhesive tape is already on the lights
These lights are a welcome alternative to traditional strings of holiday lights
Waterproof, so it can be installed and left outside without causing damage
Works efficiently indoors as well as under counter tops or coffee tables
cons: Make sure the surface you're sticking the lights to is clean
Even a little dust seems to change the effectiveness of the adhesive

customer_reviews.title: No connectors in package
customer_reviews.text: These lights look great although they did not come with the connector piece to link them together so without that piece that is in the advertising pic I can't give the product a proper review considering I needed the 32' straight run of lights and am only able to use half the product because plugging in 2 set off controller box for my application is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: These lights are GREAT!! Super easy to install as they come ...
customer_reviews.text: These lights are GREAT !! Super easy to install as they come with the adhesive tape on them already. No extra wiring needed to be done . Equipped with plugs - just plug them in and power them up. The rainbow of colors makes them great as you can leave them up unnoticed ( very small but bright ) year round, and can change the color for the different holidays. You also have the option to adjust the brightness and powering them off and on ( via remote) . Makes the pain of untangling old strings of Christmas lights an ease to the the curb .....
customer_reviews.author: you will get the facts

customer_reviews.title: Great lights but.....
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. I would give 5 stars because shipping and product were great. I wasn't able to put them up until two weeks ago at my lake house and today when I turned them on (weekends only) the last few feet aren't working. I was going to send a message but states there is only a 30 day window. I purchased the end of February but here in MO ita too cold to do outdoor projects. They are great, just bummed that now the last few feet of my deck is missing the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Rogina Murphy

customer_reviews.title: These work perfect and are of top notch
customer_reviews.text: These are the same hardware you would pay a much higher cost if you purchased a single kit from other customizer web sites and wire sites. Believe me, they just repackage this hardware and add 100 to the cost. These work perfect and are of top notch quality
customer_reviews.author: Charles Frady

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The Badalink folks were extremely helpful and very quick to reply to insure that the product performed as advertised including sending a full replacement when we only needed one part replaced. We are totally satisfied with the end result and could not find a similar product that was even close in price. Great shopping and customer service experience!
customer_reviews.author: R. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Lights worked for about three hours of light use, ...
customer_reviews.text: Lights worked for about three hours of light use, then the LED on the power brick won't even turn on anymore. The lights are probably okay, but if the power brick went defective, I don't think there is much I can do to get them working again. **UPDATE** I returned them and got another set, so as long as this set doesn't crap out, I will upgrade the rating. They are cool when they work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HELP!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received these lights and they won't work, How or where do I find help before I return it. The instruction sheet is as bad as nothing. The description of these lights sounds like you should be able to get a sustained color light. The controller won't do anything to the lights. I put a new battery in and still nothing helps. The lights just keep flashing. Nothing will change or will not shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: colors are not the same for both light strips
customer_reviews.text: colors between the two lines where not the same... for example the blue color on the one strip was a true blue. the second strip was a teal color. used on my double garage for christmas and it looked funny because the colors didnt match
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: SUPER AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: These lights are DOOPPPPEEEEE!!!! They're so bright and I love all the options on the remote. It sticks well on wall and ceiling but you're probably going to need a hand putting it up. I'd buy more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Juelzzz Santana

customer_reviews.title: Pure awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got so many of these now its crazy. I have tons in my house. The more you get the lighter the room gets in dark so you wouldn't need lights in the house anymore. It has white lights also which is a plus depending on situations.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Quick resolution to problem
customer_reviews.text: Both strips didn't last a whole two uses. Half of one strip is already out and the other half is lit at 2 different brightnesses. I was contacted by the seller almost immediately and was offered a resolution to my problem. I was asked if I wanted to try another set or if I wanted a refund. I chose to try another set as I initially like the way the lights looked. I received the new set very quickly and for that I am more satisfied for now. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Corey Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Been a year that they have been working ( indoor) in a bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Scott H

customer_reviews.title: What a DEAL !
customer_reviews.text: These look perfect on the back patio and the price is RIGHT ! I really like the light blue color, gives almost a moon glow to the back yard at night
customer_reviews.author: Video Man

customer_reviews.title: Everything seemed to be good, I installed the light strips and they worked ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything seemed to be good, I installed the light strips and they worked at first, then they would not shut off, they finally turned off and now they won't do anything at all. I replaced the battery's in the remote and still nothing, I was hoping that this product would work out for me but didn't have that great of luck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: adhesive sucks. go buy some good double sided tape. other than that good lights and bright
customer_reviews.author: Weezy

customer_reviews.title: simple and work
customer_reviews.text: Work great but, it seems like they turn on by themselves sometimes, not sure is something is faulty here but all that aside they work great
customer_reviews.author: Fred Turgeston

customer_reviews.title: product quality
customer_reviews.text: This product has given me nothing but problems since I first bought it! I have replaced this Item2x and now it still does not want to work after replacing a 1.5 year ago
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wady

customer_reviews.title: An LED for your and Me
customer_reviews.text: Great product. High degree of customization in terms of colors and frequencies. So far, extremely reliable. The adhesive leaves something to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Shock Top

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Used this to light our outdoor pergola. Works well but BUY SOME NEW 3M sticky tape as whats already on these is crap.
customer_reviews.author: Abntroop

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: pretty good quality. Installed it in my kid's room and he loves it. If I had to complain about anything it would be that the sticky part of the light strip kinda sucks. But since I mounted these lights with some brackets, the lack of stickiness didn't bother me too much.
customer_reviews.author: sho'nuff

customer_reviews.title: Very not bad
customer_reviews.text: Great lights, can't wait to hang them up. Just wish they came with better instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: happy
customer_reviews.text: have bought these 3 time now . very happy. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Harris

customer_reviews.title: the product works just fine..
customer_reviews.text: Sorry for the previous wrong review, the product works just fine ...once I discovered the little tiny arrows that had to match on the connection... Sorry again great product!
customer_reviews.author: joan pericas

customer_reviews.title: no support
customer_reviews.text: poor customer service, lights don't manage from string to string making them look weird
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $30!
customer_reviews.text: Works as described but quality is not worth the price ($20 would be reasonable). Lot of leds didn't match the color with the rest of them, two leds completely failed to produce white color.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far these are perfect October-February holiday lights outside on the house.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Young

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool!!! Pretty and bright! I like that you can dim them too!
customer_reviews.author: whitb

customer_reviews.text: Looked great, installed and lights shorted. Attempted to contact seller never replied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality adhesive
customer_reviews.text: These lights look great, but for the price I expected the adhesive on the back to adhere to a flat surface easily. It doesn't. If your walls aren't perfectly clean you'll find these light strips on the ground just hours after putting them up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: You have to use gorilla glue.cause the 3m tape dosent hold
customer_reviews.author: eric wolff

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I have them in my sauna and they ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have them in my sauna and they haven't failed yet in the major heat and moisture!! Pretty impressive!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse laForest

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to set up. Used to light up my room without it being too bright and this did the exact job. Not too expensive either
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money! I've put these on our outside deck and they work great! Love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Lights went out after only a few days of use. It didn't even last a week. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: mandi

customer_reviews.title: was good until then
customer_reviews.text: broke within 2 weeks of use. was good until then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These Are Awesome Going To Put Them On The motorhome
customer_reviews.author: Super shopper

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just got the lights last night open then today and only one of the two work
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: It is surprisingly easy to install and it takes some time
customer_reviews.text: It is surprisingly easy to install and it takes some time, but it is worth it in the end. These lights are the highLIGHT of my PC setup and they make my friends say WOW and I love them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

product_meta.title: Badalink LED Strip Lights, Waterproof 2X5M Band Light Decoration Lamp with Color 300 LEDs RGB with 44 Keys Wireless Remote Controller and Plug-in Power Supply for Party,Car,Camper,Outdoor&Indoor
feature_bullets: ❤Deal time:Save 51%OFF❤√BEST DESIGNED:SMD 5050 LED Strip=32.8 Ft--10M. SIZE ：”2x L5m x W1.1cm ", low + carbon green.This amazing strip lights supply IR remote to control 20 colors change.Perfectly for the decoration for Car,Camper,Outdoor&Indoor,Party,Wedding,Festival,Shows,Restaurant,Hotel,Commercial Building,Pub,Concert.etc.Great for Halloween & Christmas Days,Privide as a birthday gift.Don't hesitake to make a Romantic atmosphere for your girl friend/wife/family.

√BEST DECORATION LIGHTS: The led will not dim if you connect them from each output of the IR receiver (like main pic). 44keys controller contained a DIY fuction , Press "DIY" botton and then just long press one of the arrow button to set it. Also it have dimming and brightness control.

√WETERPROOF: Waterproof(not under water，but raining) and Color changeable.Very suitable for indoor lighting and decor. Such as kitchen, under cabinet, dining room, bedroom, garden, patio, balcony, party, wedding etc.

√DC SERVICE VOLTAGE: This products service voltage is DC 12V ,please do not connect with AC or other voltage.The adaptor only can load 32.8ft. Please don't increase the strip light.Physical principle of current: We all know ,the led light would brighter of series connection than parallel connection.(the perfect way to install: connect like main pic)Pls don't use the other connectors to increase more strip lights.It will make the led light become dim because of the current principle.

√REMARKS: Our strip light it no like the other cheap items,pls Recognize Badalink strip light.Install this strips is easy,parallel connection,(install like main pic)Warranty of this products is one year,in this period we guarantee replacement or repair with no charge,but exclude the situation of artificial damaged or overload working.Pls email us first with any problem on product.We will 100% solve your problem.Thank you for your support!!!
